forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a subtle dance of clouds blankets the sky, hinting at the day ahead. With a slight chance of drizzle lingering in the air, the atmosphere is contemplative, embracing the charm of early summer. The high temperature nudges gently toward a comfortable 63, yet a soft decline to about 61 in the afternoon whispers of a cooling breeze. Wind from the southwest, playful yet persistent at 8 to 14 mph, adds a dynamic touch to the serenity, occasionally gusting to remind us of nature’s capricious spirit.

Tonight, the clouds will continue their soft embrace, overshadowed by a chance of light drizzle before dawn makes its entrance. As you move through the day, a light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve as your best companion, warding off any lingering chill from the bay. The fog that occasionally weaves through the cityscape adds to the mystique of San Francisco, even if it’s not particularly imposing today. Better suited for reflective strolls along the waterfront or a visit to one of the quieter galleries, this day encourages you to savor the moment, perhaps with a brief break in a local café, where the sound of distant conversation mingles with the rich aroma of coffee.
